attributes.action: Save Reg Hollis from The Bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was saddened to hear the news that actor Jeff Stewart attempted suicide after hearing his character Reg Hollis was being axed from The Bill. I request that something be done about this as he is an insitution within the program and it will not be the without him. Please save him!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
